required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Cardiac Safety Study of Tivozanib to Evaluate the Electrocardiogram and Pharmacokinetic-Electrocardiogram Dynamics in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label Cardiac Safety Study of Tivozanib to Evaluate the Electrocardiogram and Pharmacokinetic-Electrocardiogram Dynamics in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to obtain QTc data, to assess the effects of tivozanib on ECG morphology, and to determine the pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic (PK-PD) relationship between any observed changes in cardiac repolarization (defined by QTcF duration) and the serum concentration of tivozanib.

detailed_description.textblock:
Tivozanib is a novel and potent pan-vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) receptor (VEGFR) tyrosine kinase inhibitor with potent activity against all 3 VEGFRs (VEGFR-1, -2, and -3). In nonclinical models and studies performed in humans, tivozanib has shown strong antiangiogenesis and antitumor activity.
This study is an open-label, non-randomized, exploratory single-arm trial evaluating the ECG and pharmacokinetic (PK)-ECG relationship, if any, of tivozanib in subjects with advanced solid tumors.
The purpose of this study is to evaluate the ECG intervals and morphology following treatment with tivozanib in subjects with advanced solid tumors and to determine the relationship, if any, of the change in QTc duration with serum concentration of tivozanib over time in subjects with advanced solid tumors.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in QTc with Bazett correction method (QTcB)
Change from baseline in heart rate (HR)
Change from baseline in PR interval
Change from baseline in QRS interval
Change from baseline in Uncorrected QT interval
Change from baseline in ECG morphological patterns
Correlation between the QTcF change from baseline and serum concentrations of tivozanib

intervention.description: 1 x 1.5 mg capsule of tivozanib orally once daily for 21 days

facility.name: TGEN Clinical Research Service at Scottsdale Healthcare
Jayne Gurtler MD, Laura Brinz MD, Angelo Russo MD and Janet Burroff MD APMC
